description.main: Compare pricing across major object storage providers. Input your estimated usage to find the most cost-effective solution for your needs.
description.subtext: Prices include storage costs, data transfer (egress), and API operations.
description.disclaimer1: * All prices are estimates and may vary by region

storage.label: Average Storage (TB)
storage.tooltip: Enter the amount of data you plan to store continuously for the month.
storage.description: Storage is calculated based on continuous usage throughout the month

traffic.label: Monthly Outbound Traffic (TB)
traffic.tooltip: Enter your expected monthly outbound traffic (egress).
traffic.description: Traffic is measured as total outbound data transfer per month

writeOps.label: Write Operations (millions/month)
writeOps.tooltip: Class A operations: PUT, POST, DELETE, LIST operations
writeOps.description: Write operations include modifications to objects

readOps.label: Read Operations (millions/month)
readOps.tooltip: Class B operations: GET, HEAD operations
